subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{rfe|zh|seems to have several different etyma}}
Compare: <!--Schuessler, Axel (2007)-->
# {{och-l|旁}}, {{och-l|傍}} ("side")
# {{och-l|舫}}, {{och-l|艕}} ("boat")
# {{och-l|甫}} ("to begin")
# {{och-l|放}}, {{och-l|仿}} ("to imitate")

{{ja-pos|え|suffix|hhira=へ}}

# a suffix expressing location, direction, or time

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|さま|yomi=irr}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さま}}. Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=さま|さ|tr1=sa|t1=that|pos1=pronominal indicating a person, place, thing, or direction in the middle distance|ま|tr2=ma|t2=likeness, way, similarity|pos2=suffix indicating a quality}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さま}}

# a person's [[appearance]] {{qualifier|as of body, or style, or face, etc.}}
# the [[state]] or [[situation]] of a thing
# the general [[trend]], [[tenor]], or [[feel]] of a thing
# one's [[social]] [[station]], [[status]], or [[quality]]
# the [[way]] or [[means]] of doing something, [[how]] one does something
# the [[reason]] or [[circumstances]] for something
